select cmntor_no, ifnull( (select sido_cd_nm from sido where sido_cd = #{srch_sido_cd}), '전체') as sido_cd_nm, birth_dt as ages, gender as cmmt_cnt from cmntor where length(birth_dt) > 9 AND gender in ('M','F')
AND sido_cd = case when #{srch_sido_cd} = '00' then sido_cd else #{srch_sido_cd} end

SELECT sido_cd, (select sido_cd_nm from sido s where c.sido_cd = s.sido_cd) as sido_cd_nm, round(cmntor_mon_cnt, 2) as cmntor_mon_cnt, round(cmntor_dly_tm, 2) as cmntor_dly_tm, round(cmntor_mon_work, 2) as cmntor_mon_work, round(cmntor_min_work, 2) as cmntor_min_work, round(cmntor_max_work, 2) as cmntor_max_work FROM ( SELECT a.sido_cd, avg(work_dt_cnt) as cmntor_mon_cnt, avg(round(work_tm / work_dt_cnt,2)) as cmntor_dly_tm, avg(work_tm) as cmntor_mon_work, min(round(work_tm / work_dt_cnt,2)) as cmntor_min_work, max(round(work_tm / work_dt_cnt,2)) as cmntor_max_work FROM cmntor a left join act_hist h on a.cmntor_no = h.cmntor_no WHERE work_ym between #{srch_str_ym} and #{srch_end_ym} GROUP BY a.sido_cd ) c

SELECT gugun_cd, (select gugun_cd_nm from gugun g where c.gugun_cd = g.gugun_cd) as sido_cd_nm, round(cmntor_mon_cnt, 2) as cmntor_mon_cnt, round(cmntor_dly_tm, 2) as cmntor_dly_tm, round(cmntor_mon_work, 2) as cmntor_mon_work, round(cmntor_min_work, 2) as cmntor_min_work, round(cmntor_max_work, 2) as cmntor_max_work FROM ( SELECT a.gugun_cd, avg(work_dt_cnt) as cmntor_mon_cnt, avg(round(work_tm / work_dt_cnt,2)) as cmntor_dly_tm, avg(work_tm) as cmntor_mon_work, min(round(work_tm / work_dt_cnt,2)) as cmntor_min_work, max(round(work_tm / work_dt_cnt,2)) as cmntor_max_work FROM cmntor a left join act_hist h on a.cmntor_no = h.cmntor_no WHERE work_ym between #{srch_str_ym} and #{srch_end_ym} AND a.sido_cd = #{sido_cd} GROUP BY a.gugun_cd ) c

SELECT sido_cd, (select sido_cd_nm from sido s where b.sido_cd = s.sido_cd) as sido_cd_nm, work_place, max(round(cmmt_cnt, 2)) as cmmt_cnt, max(round(avg_visitor, 2)) as avg_visitor, max(round(avg_cmmt_cnt, 2)) as avg_cmmt_cnt FROM ( SELECT sido_cd, work_place, '' as cmmt_cnt, avg_visitor, avg_cmmt_cnt FROM ( SELECT a.sido_cd, h.work_place, avg(visitor_cnt) as avg_visitor, avg(cmmt_cnt) as avg_cmmt_cnt FROM cmntor a left join act_hist h on a.cmntor_no = h.cmntor_no WHERE work_ym between #{srch_str_ym} and #{srch_end_ym} GROUP BY a.sido_cd, h.work_place ) a UNION ALL SELECT sido_cd, arrg_place as work_place, count(*) as cmmt_cnt, '' as avg_visitor, '' as avg_cmmt_cnt FROM cmntor WHERE act_yn = 'Y' GROUP BY sido_cd, arrg_place ) b GROUP BY sido_cd, work_place

SELECT gugun_cd, (select gugun_cd_nm from gugun s where b.gugun_cd = s.gugun_cd) as sido_cd_nm, work_place, max(round(cmmt_cnt, 2)) as cmmt_cnt, max(round(avg_visitor, 2)) as avg_visitor, max(round(avg_cmmt_cnt, 2)) as avg_cmmt_cnt FROM ( SELECT gugun_cd, work_place, '' as cmmt_cnt, avg_visitor, avg_cmmt_cnt FROM ( SELECT a.gugun_cd, h.work_place, avg(visitor_cnt) as avg_visitor, avg(cmmt_cnt) as avg_cmmt_cnt FROM cmntor a left join act_hist h on a.cmntor_no = h.cmntor_no WHERE work_ym between #{srch_str_ym} and #{srch_end_ym} AND a.sido_cd = #{sido_cd} GROUP BY a.gugun_cd, h.work_place ) a UNION ALL SELECT gugun_cd, arrg_place as work_place, count(*) as cmmt_cnt, '' as avg_visitor, '' as avg_cmmt_cnt FROM cmntor WHERE act_yn = 'Y' AND sido_cd = #{sido_cd} GROUP BY gugun_cd, arrg_place ) b GROUP BY gugun_cd, work_place

SELECT a.sido_cd, (select sido_cd_nm from sido s where a.sido_cd = s.sido_cd) as sido_cd_nm, case when count(h.cmntor_no) > 0 then '실시' else '미실시' end as edu_yn, max(h.edu_place) as edu_place, max(h.edu_tm) as edu_tm, count(case when h.edu_cmpl = 'Y' then h.cmntor_no else null end) as edu_cnt FROM cmntor a left join edu_cmpl_hist h on a.cmntor_no = h.cmntor_no and h.yyyy = substr(#{srch_ym},1,4) WHERE act_yn = 'Y' GROUP BY a.sido_cd

SELECT a.gugun_cd, (select gugun_cd_nm from gugun s where a.gugun_cd = s.gugun_cd) as sido_cd_nm, case when count(h.cmntor_no) > 0 then '실시' else '미실시' end as edu_yn, max(h.edu_nm) as edu_nm, max(h.edu_tm) as edu_tm, count(case when h.edu_cmpl = 'Y' then h.cmntor_no else null end) as edu_cnt FROM cmntor a left join edu_cmpl_hist h on a.cmntor_no = h.cmntor_no and h.yyyy = substr(#{srch_ym},1,4) WHERE act_yn = 'Y' AND a.sido_cd = #{sido_cd} GROUP BY a.gugun_cd

SELECT count(distinct id) as visit_user_cnt, count(*) as visit_tot_cnt FROM user_act_hist WHERE act_prt_cd = '11' AND convert(reg_tm, char(10)) between concat(#{srch_str_ym}, '-01') and concat(#{srch_end_ym}, '-31')

SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rnk, a.* FROM ( SELECT ip_info, count(*) as visit_url FROM user_act_hist WHERE act_prt_cd = '12' AND convert(reg_tm, char(10)) between concat(#{srch_str_ym}, '-01') and concat(#{srch_end_ym}, '-31') GROUP BY ip_info ORDER BY 2 desc ) a, (select @rownum:=0) tmp LIMIT 0,5
